title: Chemistry Instructor NEW!
full_description: We are hiring chemistry graduate students or postdoc to teach high school AP-Chemistry at ACES Enrichment Center. ACES AP Chemistry class is a Saturday enrichment class that helps high school students improve their problem solving skills in Chemistry and achieve high score in AP exam. The instructor should have solid understanding of both theory and experiment of chemistry, as well as excellent teaching skills. We will use AP chemistry questions to screen candidates.You are expected to:1. Love teaching.2. Have good communication skills.4. Be able to develop your course syllabus and materials.5. Have deep understanding of the subject.Job Types: Part-time, ContractPay: $35.00 - $45.00 per hour
